channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US government takes down major North Korean ‘remote IT workers’ operation
item.description: US prosecutors indicated a total of 13 people involved in the fraudulent scheme to steal and launder money for North Korea’s nuclear weapons program.

item.title: Meta restructures its AI unit under ‘Superintelligence Labs’
item.description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg is restructuring the company’s AI efforts to center around building AI “superintelligence.” Going forward, all teams working ...

item.title: Songscription launches an AI-powered ‘Shazam for sheet music’
item.description: A small company called Songscription launched last week with AI models that automate music transcription, turning an audio file of a song into sheet m...

item.title: Tailor, a ‘headless’ ERP startup, raises $22M Series A
item.description: Tailor, a San Francisco- and Tokyo-based enterprise resource planning (ERP) platform, has raised $22 million in a Series A funding round. Investors in...

item.title: Microsoft Says Its New AI System Diagnosed Patients 4 Times More Accurately Than Human Doctors
item.description: The tech giant poached several top Google researchers to help build a powerful AI tool that can diagnose patients and potentially cut health care cost...

item.title: How Do Pimple Patches Work? Here’s Everything You Need to Know
item.description: Why slather on concealer when you can just stick on a pimple patch?

item.title: My Friends Always Ask Me What MacBook to Buy. Here's What I Tell Them
item.description: Whether you're buying for yourself or someone you know, here's my advice on buying an Apple MacBook.

item.title: Lenovo Chromebook Plus 14 Review: A Game-Changer
item.description: This new Chromebook is so fantastic, it makes a compelling case for ditching Windows for good.

item.title: Here Is Everyone Mark Zuckerberg Has Hired So Far for Meta’s ‘Superintelligence’ Team
